backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing Valentine-related audio and proposal-screen features with affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend components and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page title and loading the React main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering RomanticLayout with the ValentineProposalScreen and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/animations/Confe: Generates 20 randomized heart particles for a confetti burst effect.
frontend/src/components/animations/Final: Creates 40 falling heart and sparkle particles with randomized timing for a final celebration animation.
frontend/src/components/animations/Float: Renders 15 slow-floating heart elements for ambient background motion.
frontend/src/components/animations/Spark: Generates 12 randomized sparkles for a centered burst animation.
frontend/src/components/AudioToggle.tsx: Audio toggle button interacting with shared audio context to enable or disable sound.
frontend/src/components/RomanticLayout.t: Layout wrapper providing romantic background, audio provider, audio toggle, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/screens/FinalCel: Final victory screen with celebratory animations, messages, restart button, and share option.
frontend/src/components/screens/QuizScre: Renders the quiz flow with progress, answer handling, sound effects, and celebration animations before returning a final score.
frontend/src/components/screens/ResultPe: Displays the perfect-score screen with celebratory visuals, a redeemable date coupon, and restart/sharing options.
frontend/src/components/screens/ResultTe: Shows a teasing results screen that adjusts Yes/No button sizes dynamically and prompts the user to accept the Valentine request.
frontend/src/components/screens/Valentin: Presents a Valentine proposal with a moving No button and a confirmation state that plays a sound and shows a success message.
frontend/src/components/screens/WelcomeS: Provides the introductory screen with a start button and sharing option for beginning the quiz.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button that copies the current URL to the clipboard and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/context/AudioControllerCont: Manages global audio state, background music, and multiple sound effects with enable/disable controls.
frontend/src/data/loveQuizQuestions.ts: Contains the quiz question data, including prompts, answer choices, and correct answers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioController.ts: Initializes background music and sound effects and provides functions to toggle audio and play specific sounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom romantic-themed color variables, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the romantic quiz app.
